| Overview                = The Symbiote Warriors were four [[Glossary:Clone|clones]] of [[Laura Kinney (Earth-616)|X-23]] bonded to [[Symbiotes]] that [[Blackheart (Earth-616)|Blackheart]] created to serve as his personal bodyguards.{{r|Venom Vol 2 13}}

| HistoryText             = After [[Blackheart (Earth-616)|Blackheart]] (under the [[Homo sapiens|human]] guise of Mr. Degli) purchased a vial of her blood, [[Laura Kinney (Earth-616)|X-23]] tracked him down to the [[Devil's Den]] casino, where she found four [[Glossary:Clone|clones]] of hers in a tank. She was planting C4 bombs to destroy them when they abruptly broke the glass, ready to attack her. Seeing the clones bonded to [[Symbiotes]] made their purpose as living weapons clear to X-23, leaving her with no choice but to kill them. X-23 managed to kill one of them{{r|Venom Vol 2 13}} while the other three went on to protect Blackheart, as they were created to do.{{r|Venom Vol 2 13.1}} When X-23 tried to get to Blackheart, he ordered the three remaining Symbiote Warriors to kill her, but she killed them first.{{r|Venom Vol 2 13.2}}

| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = 

| Notes                   = * Though the [[Glossary:Clone|clones]] would have inherited [[Laura Kinney (Earth-616)|X-23]]'s healing factor, healing factors do not work in [[Hell]], making them easier to kill than they might have otherwise been.
* The source of their [[Symbiotes]] is not directly stated, but they are implied to have been somehow derived from [[Toxin (Symbiote) (Earth-616)|Toxin]] as this was the only symbiote in [[Blackheart (Earth-616)|Blackheart]]'s possession.
